name: Dragon of Icespire Peak
description: A dragon has claimed the mountain peak above Phandalin, terrorizing the region. The party must help the townsfolk and eventually face the white dragon Cryovain.
seed_content: The adventure takes place in and around the frontier town of Phandalin. A young white dragon named Cryovain has recently claimed Icespire Peak as its lair, and its presence has disrupted the local ecosystem. The party will be called upon to help with various quests around the region, from clearing out monster-infested locations to rescuing townsfolk. As the adventure progresses, the threat of the dragon becomes more apparent, and the party must eventually confront Cryovain in its mountain lair.
